sentences.en: Barney ( 1990 ) emphasizes the four characteristics of firm resources: valuable , rare, inimitable and lack of substitute.
sentences.cn: Barney ( 1991 ) 的观点则是以既定的企业资源为基础的.

sentences.en: He delivered the speech in his own inimitable style.
sentences.cn: 他以其无人可模仿的独特风格发表了演说.

sentences.en: He makes his own point in his own inimitable way.
sentences.cn: 他以他独一无二的方式表明了自己的观点。

sentences.en: In her inimitable fashion, Rowling has once again given us a teaser and fueled our curiosities.
sentences.cn: 罗琳又一次以她那种无法模仿的方式给我们出了一道难题,燃起我们的好奇心.

sentences.en: Inimitable ATC and APC circuit to ensure the stability of output power.
sentences.cn: 独特的ATC和APC电路通过控制泵浦激光器的输出保证了输出功率的稳定.

sentences.en: The major box office attraction was, of course, the inimitable Peter Hunningale.
sentences.cn: 无人能比的彼得·亨宁格尔自然是主要的票房吸引力所在。

sentences.en: The study shows the brand characteristic at home and abroad is both uniform and inimitable.
sentences.cn: 比较研究表明,中外品牌个性既存在着共性的一面,也存在着独特性的一面.

sentences.en: The variation of shade gives whole picture aview, but never lose its inimitable mystery.
sentences.cn: 墨色之间的浓淡穿插,赋予画面极强的呼吸感, 又不失隐约的神秘.

words.tran_cn: 独特的；无比的；无法仿效的

trans.tran_en: You use inimitable to describe someone, especially a performer, when you like or admire them because of their special qualities
